Text.Page:
Will you help us?

Pangari is a great magician, very powerful, but without the {@RawItem:206818}, for his potions, he can do nothing!



{@RawItem:206818} can be gathered from Crimson Essence. If you can't find any out in the field, then you might be able to buy them...but they're very expensive!

Yay! Done, and quickly! This will help Pangari greatly.

Thank you, thank you!
Ingredients? Where are the essences of wind? Did you collect them?
